<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Bone Prophet](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3185)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The speakers for the dead known as bone prophets hold an esteemed place as voices for their decapitated god. Burial rites, necromantic rituals, and the delivery of cryptic utterances supposedly whispered to them by [Ydersius](/Deities.aspx?ID=211) all fall under the dominion of these priests.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Bone_Prophet.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Bone Prophet](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3185)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Serpentfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=771" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 305 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +18, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +5

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
[invisibility potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2944), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2745) of [Ydersius](/Deities.aspx?ID=211), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +19 (+4 status vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647))

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 115

</row>

**Resistances**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) 10

**Thin of Blood** Zyss serpentfolk recover slowly from injuries. When they take physical damage from a critical hit, they gain 2d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). They take a –2 circumstance penalty to flat checks to recover from persistent damage and saving throws against afflictions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +18 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 2d4+9 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +17 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 piercing plus serpentfolk venom

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 28, attack +20
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Void Warp](/Spells.aspx?ID=1745)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blood Vendetta](/Spells.aspx?ID=675), [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [See the Unseen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Bind Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=22), [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Vampiric Feast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1736) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247), [Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329) (3 slots)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 28
- **1st**
[Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28) (self only; at will)
- **3rd**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will)
- **5th**
[Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)

**Rituals** DC 28

- **2nd**
[Create Undead](/Rituals.aspx?ID=10)

**Raise Serpent** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The bone prophet animates corpses of snakes, serpentfolk, or similar serpentine creatures within a 30-foot emanation. Any flesh on the bodies sloughs off, and they rise as [skeletons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=472). The bone prophet can raise one Large creature as a [skeletal giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=375) or up to three Medium creatures as [skeletal champion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=373); the equipment and attacks might be different depending on the corpses' possessions. These skeletons have the [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=653) trait and are under the bone prophet's control; the bone prophet can give all these minions the same command with a single action that has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561) trait. Any skeletal minions that still remain after 10 minutes crumble to dust.

**Serpentfolk Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 26 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d4 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round)

</column>
